SEARCH
Package pegasus.geometry

Class BoundingSquare

java.lang.Object
pegasus.geometry.BoundingSquare
All Implemented Interfaces:
Boundary<Vector2>
public class BoundingSquare extends Object implements Boundary<Vector2>
A non-rotatable two-dimensional square represented by two boundary vectors.
